about_the_game:
Your Liege Lord needs you! As the days grow shorter, your house and that of your neighbors grow restless. Can you afford to share food with your Liege Lords house, proving your allegiance? Or will your people starve in the coming winter? Will your house guard help defend the kingdom, or will your most trusted men stay at your side?

My Liege is a medieval strategy game where you are the lord of a small noble house, sworn to your liege lord, and tasked with managing the affairs of your house and people. The choices you make today will shape the relationships your house forms and will have lasting impacts for years and generations to come.


You must balance the needs of your people, your noble house, and your liege lord as you make choices and manage the many crises your house will face. Whether it is famine, war, or nefarious neighbors, your liege lord is expecting you to handle it all while bringing honor to their name. As lord you must use your judgement, your advisors, and your resources to determine how best to move forward. How those decisions are carried out however is often out of your hands, leaving you to do your best with imperfect information and control.

Customize Your Family

Make your family your own! My Liege has a character and house editor, allowing you to change the names and appearances of every member of your family. Want to choose your allies and foes as well? You can also customize all of the members of the other 4 noble houses of the Western Valley as well!

name: My Liege

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 / AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 / R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
